hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Since 2022, we have been training professional specialists in the IT field

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: The IT Center was founded in 2022 by a small group of developers and education experts. Our main goal was to develop high-quality IT education in Uzbekistan and prepare skilled professionals.
story.paragraph2: Over 4 years, we have successfully trained more than 2,500 students, with 95% of them finding jobs in the IT industry. Today, we offer over 25 courses and collaborate with more than 50 experienced instructors.
story.paragraph3: Our educational programs meet international standards and are based on the latest technologies. We ensure an individual approach for each student and provide opportunities to gain real-world experience through practical projects.
